body.name: HP 15.6" Touchscreen Flagship HD Laptop for Business, Intel i3-1115G4 up to 4.1GHz (Beat i5-1035G4), 16GB RAM, 1TB NVMe SSD, Fast Charge, Numpad, Bluetooth, Wi-Fi, HDMI, Win 11,w/GM Accessories
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 12. Order within 8 hrs 27 mins
features: 【11th Gen Intel Core i3-1115G4 】3 GHz base frequency, up to 4.1 GHz with Intel Turbo Boost Technology, The 11th gen dual-core laptop brings the perfect combination of features to make you unstoppable. This is an ideal home office laptop to get things done fast with high performance, instant responsiveness and best-in-class connectivity. with adscispivosdy accessory

【15.6 inches Touchscreen HD Display】15.6-inch diagonal, HD (1366 x 768), touch, micro-edge, BrightView With virtually no bezel encircling the display, an ultra-wide viewing experience provides for seamless multi-monitor set-ups.
【Upgraded to 16GB DDR4-3200 MHz RAM】Substantial high-bandwidth RAM to smoothly run your games and photo- and video-editing applications, as well as multiple programs and browser tabs all at once.

【Upgraded to 1TB PCIe NVMe SSD Storage】Provides Massive Storage Space For Huge Files, So That You Can Store Important Digital Data And Work Your Way Through It With Ease. It Gives You Enormous Space To Save All Of Your Files.

【Windows 11 Home S Mode】You may switch to regular windows 11: Press "Start button" bottom left of the screen; Select "Settings" icon above "power" icon;Select Update & Security and Activation, then Go to Store; Select "Get" option under "Switch out of S mode"; Hit Install. (If you also see an "Upgrade your edition of Windows" section, be careful not to click the "Go to the Store" link that appears there.)
body.description: Microprocessor:Intel Core i3-1115G4 (up to 4.1 GHz with Intel Turbo Boost Technology, 6 MB L3 cache, 2 cores, 4 threads) Chipset:Intel Integrated SoC Memory, standard:Upgraded to 16 GB DDR4-3200 MHz RAM (1 x 8 GB) Video graphics:Intel UHD Graphics Integrated Hard drive:Upgraded to 1TB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD Optical drive:Optical drive not included Display:15.6" diagonal, HD (1366 x 768), touch, micro-edge, BrightView, 220 nits, 45% NTSC Wireless connectivity:Realtek RTL8822CE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac (2x2) Wi-Fi and Bluetooth 5 combo Expansion slots: 1 multi-format SD media card reader External ports 1 SuperSpeed USB Type-C 5Gbps signaling rate; 2 SuperSpeed USB Type-A 5Gbps signaling rate; 1 HDMI 1.4b; 1 AC smart pin; 1 headphone/microphone combo Minimum dimensions (W x D x H):35.85 x 24.2 x 1.79 cm Weight:1.69 kg Power supply type:45 W Smart AC power adapter Battery type:3-cell, 41 Wh Li-ion Battery life mixed usage:Up to 8 hours and 30 minutes Video Playback Battery life:Up to 11 hours Webcam:HP True Vision 720p HD camera with integrated dual array digital microphones Audio:Dual speakers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Laptop to run my small businesses
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new laptop that has enough storage for me to run my two small businesses from. I love it! Perfect size and its too heavy. The fan is a little bit loud but I knew that from previous reviews. The touchscreen works great and the Microsoft office was easy to set up. I have no complaints on this laptop and very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great! Great buy!
reviews.reviewText: I love it. However the keys are too light and I bought a keyboard cover to go on it and it's great! It was so easy to set up! There are only two USB ports so you need to be aware of that. For me it's perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: What I expected. I love the touch screen. However sometimes the mouse gets lost on the screen and floats around without touching the pad. Minor issue and doesn't cause much of a problem just something I noticed. Very light weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Quality pc i love it but the description said there was a faster clock speed on the processor then the one i received..it really is a great machine

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little difficult to set up
reviews.reviewText: They had windows 10 s installed., was supposed to be 11. The S blocked me from installing things I wanted. I had to find how to diable 10 S

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broken out of the box
reviews.reviewText: I really want this computer too. I trust HP but I don’t trust the seller. I just want my laptop!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Difficult to Use
reviews.reviewText: I'm not an IT Person but I have worked on computers for over 20 years and I'm not stranger to setting them up. I can't use the keyboard unless I have a light on. It's silver and the letters can't be read even with a little daylight. I have tried to download my email address, all three of them and it puts me through the ringer and I still, after hours of trying cannot get 2 of them to open. It insists I use Edge when I prefer Firefox. I should be able to decide my defaults with having to answer the question every single time I open login if I want to change my default. Get a life......On the plus size, the price was right, the camera quality is great, the keyboard touch is okay. I can send it back and I'm probably going to and get a different brand. I'm disappointed in HP. I have used their computer products many times. The only reason I'm replacing my current laptop is because the camera is on the bottom of the window. On zoom or the like, it looks up at you and that's not a good site. I need a camera that looks straight at me and this computer was just the ticket. BTW, I don't usually leave reviews but I couldn't pass this one up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this laptop for business purposes and I must say, I’m happy I decided to get this one. Also love the touchscreen!
